name: copy-as-markdown
description: Copy Link or Image as Markdown code, a Web Extension

scripts.compile: npm run compile-chrome && npm run compile-firefox && npm run compile-firefox-mv3
scripts.build-chrome: npm run compile-chrome && zip -r build/chrome.zip chrome/
scripts.build-firefox: npm run compile-firefox && npx web-ext build -s firefox/ -a build/firefox/
scripts.build-firefox-mv3: npm run compile-firefox-mv3 && npx web-ext build -s firefox-mv3/ -a build/firefox-mv3/
scripts.debug-chrome: npx nodemon --exec 'sh compile.sh chrome' & npx web-ext run -s chrome/ -t chromium --args chrome://extensions https://example.com
scripts.debug-edge: npx nodemon --exec 'sh compile.sh chrome' & npx web-ext run -s chrome/ -t chromium --chromium-binary '/Applications/Microsoft Edge.app/Contents/MacOS/Microsoft Edge' --args chrome://extensions https://example.com
scripts.debug-firefox-mv3: npx nodemon --exec 'sh compile.sh firefox-mv3' & npx web-ext run -s firefox-mv3/ --url about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox https://example.com
scripts.debug-firefox: npx nodemon --exec 'sh compile.sh firefox' & npx web-ext run -s firefox/ --url about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox https://example.com
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./build/* firefox/dist/* firefox-mv3/dist/* chrome/dist/* firefox/_locales/* firefox-mv3/_locales/* chrome/_locales/*
